snippet: Popular stars of social media platforms like Vine and Instagram are making advertising deals with companies trying to reach their audiences.
abstract: Brands and advertisers, looking for ways to reach audiences beyond television and magazines, are turning to people with many followers on social media and paying them to pitch products online; social media stars, in turn, are finding that working as conduit for a brand can be quite lucrative.
lead_paragraph: Popular stars of social media platforms like Vine and Instagram are making advertising deals with companies trying to reach their audiences.

headline.seo: Stars of Vine and Instagram Get Advertising Deals
headline.main: The Well-Followed on Social Media Cash In on Their Influence
headline.print_headline: The Well-Followed on Social Media Cash in on Their Influence
